overview: The Starlight is a Hardmode shortsword that has a 1/4 (25%) chance to be dropped by the Empress of Light boss. While the <kbd>⚒ Use / Attack</kbd> button is held, short-range light beams fire rapidly, at no mana or ammo cost.
notes: The beams are not able to deal damage to enemies through blocks, unless the enemy itself is able to pass through blocks.
Despite being able to get speed modifiers, it is completely unaffected by those and melee speed bonuses.
The weapon itself bears a striking resemblance to Asuna’s rapier from the anime Sword Art Online
tips: The quick attack speed and infinite piercing of the weapon allow it to quickly defeat hordes of enemies on the ground.
The Starlight is an efficient weapon for farming slow-moving bosses like Plantera, Ogre, and Golem, killing them in seconds.
However, it is not reliable as a main weapon against bosses because of its short range. It should be used alongside a powerful projectile melee weapon.
With the Legendary modifier, and when used against a single target, it is able to reach a DPS of around 1,100 with no additional equipment.
With the Legendary modifier, and when used against a single target, it is able to reach around 18 damage per frame with no extra equipment.
Due to its rapid attack rate, it is an effective weapon for killing the Dungeon Guardian.
It is roughly as powerful as the Solar Eruption within its effective range, though its range is much shorter.
title: Starlight
